newest.message:
# Release v4.0.14
## Bug Fixes - Reaction jobs with undocumented ESI change are now shown properly in the UI - Skills for blank character creator updated - Alpha clone status now affects display fields such as maximum market orders
## Contributors - Peter Han - OperatorOverload

release.message:
# Release v4.0.15
## Bug Fixes - Reduce spurious errors from querying corporation endpoints where the character does not have roles - Character LP list is now sorted descending by name - Notifications can now be closed by right clicking - Market order completed or expired notifications now appear again
## Contributors - Peter Han - hollo6 - corsair75 - wvdvegt
